s3.message: Fixed: Adblock Plus toolbar icon isn't always visible in pop-up windows.

s2.message: Fixed: Corruption in Adblock Plus data files might result in Adblock Plus being unable to block anything (forum topic).

s1.message: The following lists the changes compared to Adblock Plus 1.3.7.

s7.message: Some minor improvements to the data that is being sent by the issue reporter.

s6.message: Fixed: Issue reporter doesn't work in K-Meleon.

s5.message:
Fixed: When adding a filter subscription in SeaMonkey 2.1 on first run it isn't
    downloaded immediately.

s4.message: Fixed: Opening a new browser tab from Adblock Plus doesn't work in SeaMonkey 2.1.
